mapper.select: select team_id teamId, team_name teamName from team
select distinct match_season season from match_ order by match_season desc;

select player.player_id playerId,player_name name, player_position position, player_number number, ROUND(AVG(score),1) score,ROUND(AVG(bound),1) bound,ROUND(AVG(assist),1) assist, ROUND(AVG(block),1) block,ROUND(AVG(steal),1) steal from player,match_data,match_ where match_.match_id = match_data.match_id AND match_data.player_id = player.player_id AND match_season = #{season} AND( (#{teamId} = match_home and is_home=1) OR (match_away = #{teamId} and is_home=0)) group by player.player_id;

select match_id matchId,match_date date, match_home homeId,match_away awayId, home.team_name homeName, away.team_name awayName,home_score homeScore, away_score awayScore,match_status status from match_, team home, team away where match_season = #{season} AND (home.team_id = match_home and away.team_id = match_away) AND (match_home = #{teamId} OR match_away = #{teamId}) order by match_date;

select DATE_FORMAT(match_date,'%m-%d') date,match_home,home_score, match_away,away_score from match_ where match_status=1 AND match_date <= now() AND (match_home=#{teamId} or match_away=#{teamId}) order by match_date Desc limit 0,7;

select DATE_FORMAT(match_date,'%m-%d') date,match_home,home_score, match_away,away_score from match_ where match_season=#{season} AND match_status=1 AND match_date <= NOW() AND (match_home=#{teamId} or match_away=#{teamId}) order by match_date Desc;
